str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: To go up, mount, ascend; of things: I rise, spring up, come up. From ana and the base of basis; to go up.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: To break (in pieces), break bread. A primary verb; to break.
Bread, a loaf, food. From airo; bread or a loaf.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Middle - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: (a) I taste, (b) I experience. A primary verb; to taste; by implication, to eat; figuratively, to experience.
And, both. A primary particle of connection or addition; both or also.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: From homilos; to be in company with, i.e. to converse.
As far as, up to, until, during. Or achris akh'-rece; akin to akron; until or up to.
Brightness, daylight, dawn. Of uncertain derivation; a ray of light, i.e. radiance, dawn.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To go out, come out. From ek and erchomai; to issue.
